Numerical Solvers¶

Table of contents

  • Species Inheritance
  • Discrete Explicit

Species Inheritance¶

Prior to commencing population calculations over time, solvers must perform error check and species inheritance:

solvers.error_check(domain) Make sure there are no conflicts within a domain.
solvers.inherit(domain, start_time, end_time) Divide population and carrying capacity among children of species if they exist

Both population and carrying capacity data in the domain are distributed evenly among their children species.

Discrete Explicit¶

solvers.discrete_explicit(domain, start_time, end_time, **kwargs)¶

Solve the domain from a start time to an end time on a discrete time step associated with the Domain

The total populations from the previous year are used to calculate derived parameters (density, fecundity, inter-species relationships, etc.).

To run the simulation, use .execute()
